title: Erotikku ni Oborero!
description:
1-4+Extra) Tomoharu Okabe is starting to work as an illustrator for a popular sensationalist novelist, Tougo Tsubaki. Since Okabe-san is not an established mangaka yet, he is persuaded to illustrate for Tsubaki-sensei. However, this assignment with Tsubaki-sensei ends up more than he ever bargains for.

5-6) Shy Candy, Wanton Candy

related.title: Erotikku ni Oborero! - Maniac ni Oborero! Erotic ni Oborero! Bangaihen (Doujinshi)
